name: Website
detailed_description: A professional brand website that supports your business — separate from your booking system.
best_for: Businesses that want a strong online presence without mixing marketing pages and booking logic.
benefits: Custom business website (about, bio, services overview)
Prominent “Book Now” button that redirects to your Aesthetic Hub scheduling platform

name: Education
detailed_description: Run classes, trainings, and coaching programs directly through your scheduling system.
best_for: Educators, trainers, and studios running paid classes, programs, or coaching.
benefits: Multiple locations & cities for class hosting
Student enrollment with deposit or full payment
Apply discounted pricing or promo codes
Optional kit add-on (kit vs no-kit pricing)

name: Add Practitioners
description: Expand your team while staying on your current plan.
best_for: Growing teams that need scheduling, accountability, and performance visibility.
